Red Duelist Gauntlet AKA
0 0 Relic Relic
1 Creatures you control with a cost that includes Pro can attack. Only three creatures can attack this way per turn.
Amulet of Skill AKA
0 0 Relic Relic
1 At the start of your beginning phase, put a tick counter on Amulet of Skill. At the start of your main phase, you gain amulet points equal to the number of tick counters on Amulet of Skill. You may pay for 1 Skl with 2 amulet points.
Stone of Card Pitching AKA
0 0 Relic Relic
1 At the start of your beginning phase, put a tick counter on Stone of Card Pitching. Discarding a card pays for an amount of Skl or Pro equal to the amount of tick counters on Stone of Card Pitching.

Durability = 1 Strength = 1 Dexterity = 1 Thought = 2 Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) When Careful Capybara enters a play zone, draw a card.

0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Cost = 5 Log Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) Return any number of target nontoken permanents you control to your hand. Repeat the following choice for each card returned to your hand this way — • Draw a card, then discard a card. • Create a Vision token.
